title: Colorful Salad with Zambos Tostones
instructions: Step 1: Chop the tomato into wedges, slice the cucumber into rounds, slice the avocado into pieces, and thinly slice the red onion.
Step 2: Pour the chopped ingredients into a deep bowl.
Step 3: Prepare the dressing in a separate bowl. Mix all the ingredients to create the dressing. Adjust the consistency to your liking.
Step 4: Sprinkle the ½ cup of corn over the salad. Finally, pour the dressing over the salad and mix well.
Step 5: Crush the Zambos Tostones into mini chips. Alternatively, take a tostón and place some salad on it and enjoy.
